--- In gladiator@y..., "dph_of_rules" <dph_of_rules@u...> wrote:
> Ok, I'd like to hear comments about Orcs and Archers.
> 
> I would especially like to hear comments on proposed new attacks for 
> Orcs since they don't have that many.

I still would like to add "barrage of exploding bolts" to the Archer's 
attacks.  The barrage attack needs to be sped up quite a bit to be 
more effective.
